page.title: 13FARM LIFE IN FOXTON
page.content: 75%of our area is farmland.This is almost evely divided between grass for grazing and sileage and cultivated crops.Today the E.E.C. policy on farming can be seen taking effect as there are crops such as Oil seed rape growing in fields which used to be all wheat,corn,barley or oats.The latter are still grown as well to day but because of subsidies and regulations farmers cannot grow what they want where they want even if they do own the land. Of the 7 farms in our area 4 are owned and run by local farmers,the other 3 are owned by people living away and employing a manager to run the business. There is 1 Dairy farm in our 7,the rest are mixed arable i.e.cattle and crops
